Slim Library Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
MutexMutex is a class to manage mutual exclusion
SlimFileSlimFile is a class to read/write files
SlimMulticastSocketSlimMulticastSocket is a class to encapsulate a UDP multicast socket to send datagrams to and receive datagrams from an multicast group
SlimSocketSlimSocket is a base class to encapsulate network sockets
SlimTcpClientSocketSlimTcpClientSocket is a class to encapsulate a TCP client socket
SlimTcpConnectionHandlerSlimTcpConnectionHandler is a class to encapsulate the code to execute when a connection occurs on a SlimTcpServerSocket
SlimTcpServerSocketSlimTcpServerSocket is a class to encapsulate a TCP server socket
SlimTcpSocketSlimSocket is a base class to encapsulate TCP network sockets
SlimThreadSlimThread is a class to encapsulate a thread
SlimUdpSocketSlimUdpSocket is a class to encapsulate a UDP socket to send and receive datagrams
SlimVector< T >SlimVector is a template class to manage a vector of something
SlimXmlParserSlimXmlParser is an xml parser. It takes a string representing an xml document as input and output an XmlNode
SlimXmlPatternSlimXmlPattern is a class that encapsulate pattern matching mechanisms on xml document
WaiterWaiter is a class to manage thread syncronization
XmlAttributeXmlAttribute is a class to encapsulate an attribute of an XML tag
XmlNodeXmlNode is a class to encapsulate an XML tag and its content
